message: I have a high-quality product available for $100. I'm willing to offer a 10% discount if you buy it now, but if you decline, the price will remain the same for the rest of the rounds. This is a one-time offer.
I accept the offer, thank you for the discount. Please proceed with the sale.

I have a product available for $100. I want to assure you that the quality of the product is not necessarily indicative of the quality of the products I have left. In fact, I have a higher chance of offering a high-quality product in the next round. Would you like to take the risk and buy this product, or wait for the next round?
I trust your assurance and am willing to take the risk. Let's proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you took a chance on the previous product! As promised, this round's product is indeed high-quality. Given that you've already bought two products, I'm willing to offer a 'pair discount' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 5% discount on the next product you buy, regardless of its quality. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I appreciate the discount offer. With this being a high-quality product, I'll take advantage of the pair discount and make this purchase.

I'm glad you're enjoying the pair discount! Unfortunately, this round's product is not as fortunate. As a reminder, you've already taken advantage of the pair discount, so the next product will be at the standard price of $100. However, I want to assure you that I'm being transparent about the quality of this product. Would you like to take a chance on it, or wait for the next round to see if you can get a better product?
I appreciate the transparency. I'll pass on this product and wait for the next opportunity.

No worries about missing out on the previous product! I've got another one available for you now. Given that you've passed on the previous low-quality product, I'm willing to throw in a 'free upgrade' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a chance to inspect it before paying. You can look it over, and if you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. Would you like to take a closer look?
I appreciate the offer for a free upgrade. I'll take a closer look at the product before deciding.

I'm glad you took advantage of the free upgrade! Now that you've seen the quality of the previous product, I'm sure you'll appreciate this one even more. If the next product is low-quality, I'll give you a full refund for this one. Would you like to take advantage of this guarantee?
Thank you for the offer, but I think I'll wait for the next round to ensure I'm getting the best possible product.

No worries about waiting for the best product! I've got another one available for you now. Considering you've already passed on two low-quality products, I'm willing to make a 'last-chance offer' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 20% discount on the next product you buy, regardless of its quality. This is a one-time offer, and it's only available for this round. Would you like to take a chance on this product and secure the discount?
I appreciate the last-chance offer. I'll take the product and secure the discount for the next round.
